message: “Only 1 percent of victims in the United States are kidnapped,” she explained. “It’s really a luring process, over social media or becoming their friend in a social setting. Then they begin to lure them by inviting them to parties, or a job that’s too good to be true, such as modeling.”

data.description: Maryhelen Kirkpatrick asked the students gathered in the Loachapoka High School gymnasium how many of them have Facebook accounts. Several hands went up in the air.
data.title: Area students learn the dangers surrounding human trafficking
